description: Time and date utilities for Osaurus

tools.description: Get the current date and time, optionally in a specific timezone

timezone.description: IANA timezone identifier (e.g., 'America/New_York', 'UTC'). Defaults to system timezone.

tools.description: Format a timestamp or date string into a specified format

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp in seconds. If not provided, uses current time.

format.description: Output format: 'iso8601', 'rfc2822', 'relative', or a custom strftime format string. Defaults to 'iso8601'.

timezone.description: IANA timezone identifier for output. Defaults to system timezone.
